fields.Name: Randuin's Omen
fields.Description: +500 Health +70 Armor UNIQUE Passive - Cold Steel: When hit by basic attacks, reduces the attacker's Attack Speed by 15%. UNIQUE Active: Slows the Movement Speed of nearby enemy units by 35% for 2 seconds (+1 second per 200 Armor and +1 second per 200 Magic Resist) (60 second cooldown). (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
